mapper.select: SELECT a.`year`, a.term, a.campus, a.class_id AS 'classId', a.section AS 'sectionTime', b.teacher_uid AS 'teacherId', b.id AS 'schId', b.course_id AS 'courseId', b.limit_person AS 'limitPerson', c.`name` AS 'courseName', c.campus AS 'courseCampus', c.sex, d.`name` AS 'courseSite', e.`name` AS 'teacherName', f.YEAR, f.term, f.week_class_time AS 'weekClassTime' FROM zc_sports_class_section AS a INNER JOIN zc_sports_schedules AS b ON a.`year` = b.`year` AND a.term = b.term AND a.campus = b.campus AND a.section = b.section AND b.is_del = 0 INNER JOIN zc_sports_course AS c ON b.course_id = c.id INNER JOIN zc_sports_site AS d ON c.site_id = d.id INNER JOIN zc_user AS e ON b.teacher_uid = e.id INNER JOIN zc_sports_config AS f ON a.`year` = f.`year` AND a.term = f.term WHERE a.class_id = ${classId} AND a.`year` = ${year} AND a.term = ${term} ORDER BY class_id ASC

SELECT campus, start_time AS 'start', FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) AS 'startTime', end_time AS 'end', FROM_UNIXTIME(end_time) AS 'endTime' FROM zc_sports_config_selection_time WHERE is_gregory_date = #{isGregory} AND config_id = #{configId}

SELECT a.id AS 'courseId', a.limit_person AS 'count' FROM zc_sports_schedules AS a INNER JOIN zc_sports_course AS b ON a.course_id = b.id INNER JOIN zc_sports_site AS c ON b.site_id = c.id INNER JOIN zc_user AS d ON a.teacher_uid = d.id WHERE a.`year` = ${year} AND a.term = ${term} ORDER BY a.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zc_sports_stu_success_sch (year, term, uid, sch_id, class_id, phone, remark, operate_type, create_time, update_time, status, is_del) VALUES (#{year}, #{term}, #{uid}, #{schId}, #{classId}, #{phone}, #{remark}, #{operateType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{isDel})
mapper.select: SELECT a.campus, b.uid, c.username, c.name, c.type, b.faculty, b.class AS 'classId', b.sex, b.phone, e.title AS 'classTitle', e.grade, d.title AS 'facultyTitle' FROM zc_sports_class_section a INNER JOIN zc_user_detail AS b ON a.class_id = b.class INNER JOIN zc_user AS c ON b.uid = c.id INNER JOIN zc_faculty AS d ON b.faculty = d.id INNER JOIN zc_class AS e ON a.class_id = e.id WHERE a.year = #{year} AND a.term = #{term} ORDER BY c.username ASC

SELECT a.campus, b.uid, c.username, c.name, c.type, b.faculty, b.class AS 'classId', b.sex, b.phone, e.title AS 'classTitle', e.grade, d.title AS 'facultyTitle' FROM zc_sports_class_section a INNER JOIN zc_user_detail AS b ON a.class_id = b.class INNER JOIN zc_user AS c ON b.uid = c.id AND c.id = #{id} INNER JOIN zc_faculty AS d ON b.faculty = d.id INNER JOIN zc_class AS e ON a.class_id = e.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zc_sports_course_selection_log (uid, ip, sch_id, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{ip}, #{schId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

INSERT INTO zc_sports_stu_results (year, term, campus, uid, course_id, teacher_uid, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{year}, #{term}, #{campus}, #{uid}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
INSERT INTO zc_form_log (form_id, data_id, uid, faculty, create_at, update_at, status) VALUES (#{formId}, #{dataId}, #{uid}, #{faculty}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status})
